summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3065, for the improvement of Allison Street, from Harvard Avenue North to Fuhrman Avenue, all in the City of Seattle, under Ordinance No. 37208 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
